definition: to refuse politely
to thank/to apologize/to wither (of flowers, leaves etc)/to decline
surname Xie
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
variant of 絕|绝[jue2]
closed to visitors/no admittance

sentences.english: A blind man smilingly declined to be helped across the street.
sentences.chinese: 盲人微笑着谢绝别人帮他过马路。

sentences.english: He declined your offer with thanks.
sentences.chinese: 他对你的馈赠婉言谢绝了。

sentences.english: But this he declined , as he was dirty and wet.
sentences.chinese: 不过，这被他谢绝了，因为他浑身又脏又湿。

sentences.english: Most of the time I decline, especially for stores I rarely frequent.
sentences.chinese: 大多数时候我谢绝了，特别是不常去的地方。

sentences.english: Glisan declined to reveal the names of any ADPC clients.
sentences.chinese: 格里桑谢绝公布任何ADPC的客户名称。

sentences.english: Thumbling, however, declined, and said he wanted to see the world first.
sentences.chinese: 大拇哥谢绝了，说自己想先周游世界。
我婉言谢绝了他们的邀请。

sentences.english: He declined the invitation with stately grace.
sentences.chinese: 他庄严而文雅地谢绝了邀请。

sentences.english: People just having taken alcohol are declined. No smoking after taking seat.
sentences.chinese: 谢绝酒后乘坐，乘坐时严禁吸烟。

sentences.english: I love, not open to visitors.
He graciously declined all the visits.
sentences.chinese: 他婉言谢绝了一切来访。

sentences.english: I thanked her but still refused to accept.
Molly chose a better house for him at first but he declined it with thanks.
sentences.chinese: 茉莉本来选了一所较大的房子，却被他婉言谢绝了。

sentences.english: Im gonna make him an offer he cant refuse.
sentences.chinese: 我准备向他提出一个他弗成能谢绝的前提。

sentences.english: Under such a circumstance I would give a flat denial, and ride off as fast as I could.
sentences.chinese: 遇到这种事，我会爽爽快快地谢绝，骑上马就走。

definition: to forward (a shipment)/to reprint sth published elsewhere/Taiwan pr. [zhuan3 zai4]
originality/creativity/innovation
piece of writing submitted for publication/manuscript/article
to submit articles for publication/to contribute (writing)
to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request
this text/article/the main body of a book
author/writer/CL:個|个[ge4]
copyright
the author takes sole responsibility for the views expressed here (disclaimer)
to welcome/welcome
to plagiarize/to copy/to attack the flank or rear of an enemy
to infringe the rights of/to violate/infringement
source (esp. of quotation or literary allusion)/origin/where sth comes from
hereby
to tactfully decline/to turn down gracefully
please (do sth) (deferential form)
